title: ABUS Releases the Granit Super Extreme 2500 U-Lock for Protection Against Cordless Grinders
content:
Extreme tech and extreme security are what ABUS brings to the market with the launch of the new U-lock, the Granit Super Extreme 2500. Special tungsten carbide material makes it extra tough for even the hardest-core bike thieves and is made to stand up against the dreaded cordless angle grinders that the bastards are using nowadays.

Bicycles are getting ridiculously expensive, especially commuter and cargo eBikes. Having ultimate defense while you’re out running errands or picking up the kiddos, is where the Granit Super Extreme 2500 shines.

Countless hours of design and development went into creating the Granit Super Extreme 2500. Ensuring the best possible resistance to attacks from the go-to tool that professional bike thieves are using, the cordless angle grinder.

It’s all About the Wolf…

The Wolfram Carbide that armors the shackle and lock body of the Granit Super Extreme 2500 greatly increases the resistance to cordless angle grinder attacks. Slowing the thief down is probably one of the best ways to deter theft from happening.

What About the Tech?

ABUS has equipped the Granit Super Extreme 2500 with its ABUS XPlus cylinder. This cylinder offers high protection against picking. The XPlus cylinder can also be keyed like other ABUS locks as part of the One Key Option.

If you need ultimate protection when securing your prized steed try the ABUS Granit Super Extreme 2500.

Granit Super Extreme 2500 Details and Retails

Retail: $299 ($329, with bracket)

  • Hardened 27 mm square parabolic shackle with plastic coating
  • Thanks to the Wolfram Carbide coating the lock shackle and body are protected against attacks with a cordless angle grinder.
  • Double locking shackle
  • The shackle, housing, and structural parts of the locking mechanism are made of specially hardened steel
  • ABUS XPlus™ cylinder for extremely high protection against manipulation, e.g. picking
  • ABUS Power Cell technology offers maximum protection against brute force impacts.
  • Two keys included
  • ABUS Key Code Card included
